meanings.definition: Connect to (a computer or server) using the Telnet protocol.
meanings.sent1: I telneted to the server to check my email.
meanings.sent2: She telneted into the computer to troubleshoot the issue.
meanings.sent3: The cat telneted into the fish tank, hoping for a virtual swim.
meanings.sent4: His words telneted into her heart, leaving a lasting connection.
meanings.sent5: The idea of telneting into the future excited him beyond measure.

meanings.definition: Accessed or interacted with (a computer or server) using Telnet.
meanings.sent1: They telneted the system to retrieve the data.
meanings.sent2: We telneted the server to configure the settings.
meanings.sent3: The robot telneted into the mainframe, causing a digital dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts telneted through cyberspace, seeking answers in the virtual realm.
meanings.sent5: The music telneted into their ears, transporting them to a different world.
